H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H2673.def: = state in which an object is divided into two or more parts

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H1544.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ usually made from stone or wood overlaid with gold or silver; ► functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H8251.def: = an object that is regarded as unclean and therefore treated as utterly detestable

H6588.def: = action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression

H3467.def: = action by which humans or deities help themselves in a (difficult) situation

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4186.def: = place where an inanimate object is located, such as the statue of a deity and a town

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2891.def: = process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H2708.def: = patterns of behavior that a community expects its members to follow

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H4908.def: = location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
